item.title: Installing Gollum on OSX Catalina
item.description: I’m working on a wiki page on Gitlab. In this particular case, I need to attach a file into the wiki. Which can’t be done using web editor on Gitlab. So I’m trying to edit it locally. In short, I need to pull the wiki and install Gollum on my laptop. Unfortunately, it didn’t go smoothly like a banana (?).
